text: The reply was not bereft of asperity: 'Beaudesert, Sept. 27, 1835' Dear Melbourne, 'I have received your letter of yesterday.' I am not prepared to spend the remainder of my life at Gibraltar, & moreover (if even residence were not the condition), having no taste for a sinecure, I have only to thank you for the offer & to decline it.
handwritten_text: The reply was not bereft of asperity: 'Beaudesert, Sept. 27, 1835' Dear Melbourne, 'I have received your letter of yesterday.' I am not prepared to spend the remainder of my life at Gibraltar, & moreover (if even residence were not the condition), having no taste for a sinecure, I have only to thank you for the offer & to decline it.
